name: Dreamchaser (twixyuu, Yiyang Lu, szhan253, diadiaa)
description:
Follow Lucy as she travels through her dreams to recover her lost memories!

Controls:

  • Press WASD for movement
  • Press SPACE to collect items
  • Press Q or E to switch form

Created By:

  • Artists: Thrisha Kopula, Diana Yee
  • Programmers: Yiyang Lu, Siyi Zhang
